DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate biological psychosocial benefit home-based resistance-training program sedentary , obese adult live type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Home Based Resistance Training For Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Obese individual type 2 diabetes randomly assign either experimental group perform moderate high intensity resistance training ( 50-60 % 1RM week 1-3 70-85 % 1RM week 4-16 ) three time per week 16 week non-training control group . All resistance training perform home use multigym apparatus . A personal trainer ( PT ) come home participant experimental group make sure exercise perform safely correct technique , prescribed intensity . In first two week , PT come 3 session per week . In week 3-4 reduce 2 time per week , week 5-8 PT come per week last 8 week bi-weekly .
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes Overweight Obese ( BMI > 28 ) Living inside City limit Ischemic heart disease Osteoporosis Musculoskeletal abnormality Currently perform resistance training
